movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption

trailer.description: Andy Dufresne, a banker wrongly convicted of murder, finds himself in the harsh world of Shawshank State Penitentiary. Through enduring friendships and personal resilience, he seeks redemption and freedom.

movies.summary: Andy Dufresne, a banker wrongly convicted of murder, is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary where he forms an unlikely friendship with fellow inmate Red and seeks to prove his innocence.

movies.title: The Godfather

trailer.description: The Godfather chronicles the powerful and complex story of the Corleone family, led by patriarch Vito Corleone, as they navigate power struggles, loyalty, and betrayal in the world of organized crime.

movies.summary: The Godfather is a dramatic portrayal of a powerful Italian-American crime family led by Vito Corleone. As he seeks to transfer power to his reluctant son Michael, the family faces internal and external challenges.

movies.title: The Dark Knight

trailer.description: The Dark Knight follows Batman as he confronts the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to plunge Gotham City into chaos. Batman must navigate the fine line between heroism and vigilante justice.

movies.summary: Batman, with the help of allies, faces off against the Joker, a psychopathic criminal who wants to destroy Gotham City. As the stakes rise, Batman must deal with the personal cost of his crusade and the nature of justice.

nominated.recipient: Paul Franklin, Chris Corbould, Andrew Lockley, Peter Bebb

won.recipient: Richard King, Lora Hirschberg, Gary A. Rizzo, Ed Novick
Paul Franklin, Chris Corbould, Andrew Lockley, Peter Bebb

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II

trailer.description: The Godfather Part II continues the saga of the Corleone family, exploring the rise of Michael Corleone as the new Godfather while depicting the early life of Vito Corleone, reflecting on the family's legacy.

movies.summary: The Godfather: Part II explores Michael Corleone's efforts to consolidate his family's power, revealing the origins of his father Vito Corleone's rise in the world of organized crime and the ongoing challenges of leadership.

won.recipient: Francis Ford Coppola, Albert S. Ruddy

movies.title: 12 Angry Men

trailer.description: 12 Angry Men is a tense courtroom drama where twelve jurors must reach a unanimous verdict in a murder trial. As they deliberate, personal biases and conflicts emerge, challenging the principles of justice and fairness.

movies.summary: 12 Angry Men is a classic drama that explores the complexities of the jury system as twelve men deliberate over a murder trial. Their personal biases and conflicts come to light as they struggle to reach a fair verdict.

movies.title: Schindler's List

trailer.description: Schindler's List is a powerful historical drama that tells the true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved over a thousand Polish Jews during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

movies.summary: Schindler's List is a gripping historical drama depicting the life of Oskar Schindler, a businessman who risked everything to save more than a thousand Jews from the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

won.recipient: Steven Spielberg, Gerald R. Molen, Branko Lustig

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

trailer.description: The Return of the King concludes the epic journey of the Lord of the Rings trilogy as Frodo and Sam reach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring, while Aragorn leads the forces of good in a climactic battle against Sauron's army.

movies.summary: The Return of the King brings the epic journey of the Lord of the Rings trilogy to a grand conclusion, featuring the final battle between good and evil and the ultimate quest to destroy the One Ring.

won.recipient: Peter Jackson, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens, Barry M. Osborne
Peter Jackson, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens
Dan Hennah, Alan Lee, Richard Taylor
Joe Letteri, Randy Cook, Alex Funke

movies.title: Pulp Fiction

trailer.description: Pulp Fiction is a stylish and darkly comedic film that weaves together multiple interlocking stories involving crime and violence, directed by Quentin Tarantino.

movies.summary: Pulp Fiction is a film by Quentin Tarantino that presents a series of interlocking stories involving crime and violence, blending dark humor and sharp dialogue in a unique narrative style.

won.category: Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy

movies.title: Forrest Gump

trailer.description: Forrest Gump is an inspiring tale of a man with a low IQ who leads an extraordinary life, encountering pivotal moments in American history and demonstrating incredible perseverance and heart.

movies.summary: Forrest Gump is an inspiring tale of a man with a low IQ who leads an extraordinary life, encountering pivotal moments in American history and demonstrating incredible perseverance and heart.

won.recipient: Wendy Finerman, Steve Tisch, Frank Marshall

won.category: Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy
Best Actor – Motion Picture Musical or Comedy

movies.title: Past Lives

trailer.description: A romantic drama exploring the emotional journey of two childhood friends from Seoul who reunite decades later in New York City.

movies.summary: Two childhood friends from Seoul reunite decades later in New York City, navigating their past feelings and present lives.

nominated.category: Best Actress in a Motion Picture – Drama
Best Film Not in the English Language

movies.title: Oppenheimer

trailer.description: A historical drama delving into the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who played a pivotal role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.summary: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

nominated.recipient: Emma Thomas, Charles Roven, Christopher Nolan
Richard King, Gary A. Rizzo, Gregg Landaker

nominated.category: Best Actor in a Motion Picture – Drama

movies.title: Barbie

trailer.description: A humorous take on the iconic doll's story, featuring a vibrant cast and a journey of self-discovery in a fantastical world.

movies.summary: A fresh and humorous approach to the iconic doll's story, with a focus on adventure and self-discovery in a fantastical world.

nominated.category: Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy
Best Actress in a Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy

movies.title: Killers of the Flower Moon

trailer.description: Martin Scorsese’s crime drama about the Osage Nation murders in 1920s Oklahoma, featuring a gripping narrative and stellar performances.

movies.summary: A crime drama set in 1920s Oklahoma about the Osage Nation murders, exploring themes of greed, betrayal, and justice.

nominated.category: Best Actor in a Motion Picture – Drama
